scripts.postinstall: if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1 && git config --get remote.origin.url >/dev/null 2>&1 && git lfs version >/dev/null 2>&1; then git lfs install --local && git lfs fetch --all && git lfs checkout; else echo 'Skipping git-lfs assets (no remote or git-lfs unavailable)'; fi && nuxt prepare
